com.berbils.game.handlers

Class SpriteHandlerMini

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.berbils.game.handlers.SpriteHandlerMini

  • public class SpriteHandlerMini
extends java.lang.Object
    handles all the sprites created within a particular world/screen

    Split into two categories, fixture associated sprites and sprite-only sprites

    Fixture associated sprites are constantly updated according to its associated fixture and fixture body, whereas sprite-only sprites are only changed externally and on call

    The fixture associated sprites are "attached" to an Entity class and are drawn before sprite-only sprites regardless of sprite layer. The sprite-only sprites are just a sprite with no Box2D or Entity properties and are drawn after all fixture associated sprites.

    The sprite layers work internally so if the sprite layer no = 4, fixture associated will have its own four layers and sprite-only will have its own four layers

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpriteHandlerMini(MiniGame screen)
      Creates the ArrayLists for the sprites dependent upon the number of layers specified and creates the world map sprite.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpriteHandlerMini

        public SpriteHandlerMini(MiniGame screen)
        Creates the ArrayLists for the sprites dependent upon the number of layers specified and creates the world map sprite. The world map sprite is the background, drawn before everything else.
        Parameters:
        screen - The screen the sprites will be created in/on

    • Method Detail

      • createNewSprite

        public Sprite createNewSprite(Fixture associatedFixture,
                              Texture spriteTexture,
                              int spriteLayer)
        Creates a fixture associated sprite, all fixtures passed must be an Entity type.
        Parameters:
        associatedFixture - The fixture the spite is "attached" to
        spriteTexture - The sprite texture
        spriteLayer - The layer the sprite will be drawn on within the fixture associated sprites layer groupings
        Returns:
        Returns the sprite created

      • createNewSprite

                              Vector2 spriteSize,
                              int spriteLayer)
        Creates a sprite-only sprite
        Parameters:
        textureFP - The file path to the textue for the sprit e
        spritePos - The position in meters where the sprite should be drawn
        spriteSize - The size in meteres of the sprite
        spriteLayer - The layer the sprite will be drawn on within the sprite-only sprites layer groupings
        Returns:
        Returns the created sprite
